thread.section_title: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of webuy.com
thread.title: Ceri Taylor
thread.title_full: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom reviewed by Ceri Taylor

author: Ceri Taylor
title: Ceri Taylor
text: Very pleased with my order - went through the site, picked out 8-10 items I wanted, placed the order and the next day they all turned up in the post - very fast! I opened them up and everything was in order and as described - I'll be ordering again soon after that service.
